title: Quarkus 1.11.2.Final released - Bugfixes
content: 1.11.2.Final is a maintenance release fixing bugs and improving the documentation. It is a safe upgrade for everyone using Quarkus 1.11. If you are not using 1.11 already, please refer to the 1.11 migration guide. Whatâ€™s new? Hibernate ORM We upgraded to Hibernate ORM 5.4.27.SP1 which fixes an important issue,...
